summary: This report examines the pandemic 's effect on academic progress in the 2020-21 school year. In our survey , many K-12 public school teachers reported that more of their students started the year behind and made less progress than in a typical year. title: Pandemic Learning: Less Academic Progress Overall, Student and Teacher Strain, and Implications for the Future
